CustomField.formula: If( NOT(ISNULL(Plan_Coordinator__c)) , ((DateValue( CreatedDate ) - DateValue( CreatedDate ) - 2*( floor((DateValue( CreatedDate) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((DateValue( CreatedDate) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7)))), ( Today() - DateValue( CreatedDate ) -2*(floor(( Today() - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor(( DateValue(CreatedDate ) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))))
CustomField.label: AC Case Age Excluding weekends
